name: Daniel Loreto
overview:
Daniel Loreto is a technology entrepreneur based in New York City and part of Twitter NY's engineering management. He joined Twitter as part of the Julpan acquisition, where he was part of senior management. Before Julpan he was a Tech Lead in the Google Search Quality team.
His passion is creating products and technology driven by data: Social data, real-time data, local data, visual data, structured data, mobile data, you name it.
